item.title: Natascha add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "There are some secrets which do not permit themselves to be told." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Life is our dictionary" -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Herman Melville
item.description: "I am madness maddened! That wild madness that's only calm to comprehend itself" -- Herman Melville

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Because I could not stop for Death – He kindly stopped for me – The Carriage held but just Ourselves – And Immortality." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Natascha add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "After a while I went out and left the hospital and walked back to the hotel in the rain." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "I have always depended on the kindness of strangers." -- Tennessee Williams

item.title: Natascha add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Frailty, thy name is woman!" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "Mendacity is a system that we live in," declares Brick. "Liquor is one way out an'death's the other." -- Tennessee Williams

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "I cannot write any sort of story unless there is at least one character in it for whom I have physical desire." -- Tennessee Williams

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Hemingway, Ernest
item.description: "I drink to make other people more interesting." -- Hemingway, Ernest

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "The first draft of anything is shit." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Peter De Vries
item.description: "Sometimes I write drunk and revise sober, and sometimes I write sober and revise drunk. But you have to have both elements in creation — the Apollonian and the Dionysian, or spontaneity and restraint, emotion and discipline." -- Peter De Vries

item.title: Natascha add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Natascha add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Lord Polonius: What do you read, my lord? Hamlet: Words, words, words. Lord Polonius: What is the matter, my lord? Hamlet: Between who? Lord Polonius: I mean, the matter that you read, my lord." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Natascha add a quote by William Shakespeare
Natascha add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Conscience doth make cowards of us all." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Natascha add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The first thing we do, let's kill all the lawyers." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Natascha add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Though this be madness, yet there is method in't." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Natascha add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Shall I compare thee to a summer's day? Thou art more lovely and more temperate: Rough winds do shake the darling buds of May, And summer's lease hath all too short a date: Sometimes too hot the eye of heaven shines, And too often is his gold complexion dimm'd: And every fair from fair sometimes declines, By chance or natures changing course untrimm'd; By thy eternal summer shall not fade, Nor lose possession of that fair thou owest; Nor shall Death brag thou wander'st in his shade, When in eternal lines to time thou growest: So long as men can breathe or eyes can see, So long lives this and this gives life to thee." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Natascha add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Natascha add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde
